${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:LuckRelic.NAME: Luck
${modID}:LuckRelic.FLAVOR: When it comes to luck, make your own.
DESCRIPTIONS: % chance to double rewards from combat.

${modID}:CasinoCatalyst.NAME: Casino Catalyst
${modID}:CasinoCatalyst.FLAVOR: A mysterious catalyst containing enormous power. Stolen from the Casino.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #y${modID}:Mark a card in hand. If you win without playing the #y${modID}:Marked card, increase your #yLuck.
